divs: Sighting Details1030pm asked wife if car windos shut says no aparments have a back exit to parking very cold wind is blowing sleet verticly as soon as i walk out the building its just above a privte fence i thought someone paid alot of money for that ballon i went shut window going back the object moved j beside a transformer on the pole it was hovering at 45 degree i thought its taking juice from the transformer iwas going to run back to the aper but decided to see what this thing was going to do so i raised my coller up and waited watch it for 3 to 5 min the object moved bcak into the darkness and that is it this object had large chrismas lights did not make any noise it was under a telephone light it was a clear view i had no reaction it was just very very cold night my wife went out with me but she ran back to the apart inever told anyone seems i brought it upit up a few conversations no one is enterested so this is my story like all the other storys
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Irving
